name: Treasure Hunter Man
description:
This game is about a man who hunts for treasure on an island inhabited by unfriendly people and some old dead king or something. But since you're a treasure hunting teenager you don't care, anyway. You also like to ride bottle rockets for some reason. First time adventurers are welcome to visit the old ladies' creepy cellar.

This is my last game complete game I made in Clickteam's Multimedia Fusion. It was fun while it lasted.
